title.big: Stunning and effective front end for the largest college faculty senate in Virginia.

intro.content: Back in 2021, FSVA had an old, outdated and non-functional website. Profesor Rodriguez came to HERMES in search of a redesign. We added modern design choice, a member search feature, and gave the site a much needed facelift. The site is now fully functional and easy to use.

description.content: We also added an Amazon S3 based file system for the faculty to share files with through the site. The system is easy to use and allows for easy file sharing and management.
